article:
This year I go to a new middle school. I love _ very much. It's very big and clean. We have _ buildings -- one is for studying, and the other one is for living. We have three _ . We do experiments  there. I like doing experiments. I think it's very _ . There are 50 computers in the computer room, _ we all love Computer class. There are a lot of flowers, grass and trees on the playground. We often sit there and draw pictures of them in _ class.
In this school, teachers and students are like friends. I enjoy _ here. I like all the subjects and teachers. How _ your school life? Do you like it, too? Please write and _ me.
